content.question: Which of the following best characterizes the author’s choice to use the pronouns “we” and “our” throughout the passage?

choices.label: It implies his deep connection to a specific culture.
It suggests that most people will readily agree with his conclusion.
It encourages his readers to propose their own theories on the subject.
It emphasizes that his thesis applies to all people.

content.answer: It emphasizes that his thesis applies to all people.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain how an argument demonstrates understanding of an audience's beliefs, values, or needs.
